environment_variables.SPACK_DEPENDENCIES: ^intel-mkl@2020.4.304/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mkl@2020.4.304 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^parmetis@4.0.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' parmetis@4.0.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317) ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
environment_variables.SPACK_SPEC: superlu-dist@7.1.1 % intel@19.1.3.304 +cuda cuda_arch=70,80 ~int64 ~ipo ~openmp +shared ^intel-mkl@2020.4.304/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' intel-mkl@2020.4.304 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ~ilp64 threads=none) ^parmetis@4.0.3/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' parmetis@4.0.3 % ${SPACK_COMPILER} ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317) ^cuda@11.2.2/$(spack find --format '{hash:7}' cuda@11.2.2 % ${SPACK_COMPILER})
